absence.annual_leave_desc: Annual leave is used for planned vacations or rest periods, usually during summer.
absence.sick_leave_desc: Sick leave is taken when the employee is physically unable to work due to illness or accident.
absence.unpaid_leave_desc: Unpaid leave is taken when the employee needs to be absent for a personal reason without pay.
absence.training_desc: Training is a period when the employee participates in learning sessions to acquire new skills.
absence.maternity_leave_desc: Maternity leave is reserved for pregnant women before and after childbirth.
absence.exceptional_leave_desc: Exceptional leave is taken for unique and unforeseen events, such as funerals or family emergencies.
absence.external_mission_desc: External mission is used when the employee travels to work outside the company.
absence.remote_work_desc: Remote work is an option to work from a location other than the office.
